title: The People’s House: Inside the White House (Obama)
description: A 360° guided look inside the White House with historical context.
educational: Use in civics to discuss the executive branch, institutions, and public access to government spaces.
notes: Works in YouTube VR on Quest

title: Census in 360: Behind the Numbers
description: Short 360° explainer on how census data is gathered and used.
educational: Kick off lessons on demographics, surveys, and how data informs policy and funding.

title: Supreme Court Building 360 Tour
description: A 360° tour highlighting the architecture and function of the U.S. Supreme Court.
educational: Supports discussions on judicial process, separation of powers, and court traditions.

title: Smithsonian National Museum of American History 360
description: A virtual walk-through of major exhibits at the National Museum of American History.
educational: Great for primary sources, artifacts analysis, and American cultural history.

title: Teotihuacan Pyramids 360
description: A panoramic visit to the pyramids and avenues of Teotihuacan.
educational: Use for Hispanic Heritage Month to discuss pre-Columbian civilizations and urban planning.

title: Día de Muertos (Day of the Dead) 360
description: Immersive 360° coverage of Day of the Dead altars, parades, and traditions.
educational: Encourage cultural literacy and compare rituals across communities.

title: Frida Kahlo Museum (Casa Azul) Virtual Tour
description: A 360° look inside Frida Kahlo’s home and studio with featured works.
educational: Pairs with art lessons on self-portraiture, symbolism, and historical context.

title: Inside CERN (ATLAS) 360
description: A 360° tour of the ATLAS experiment and CERN facilities.
educational: Discuss large-scale science, instrumentation, and international collaboration.

title: NASA: Journey Through the Solar System (Playlist)
description: Curated NASA videos exploring planets, missions, and discoveries.
educational: Supplement Titans of Space with mission footage and current science highlights.

title: MIT.nano 360 Lab Tour
description: A 360° tour of MIT.nano’s cleanroom and research spaces.
educational: Start conversations on lab safety, ethics, and precision manufacturing.

title: The Human Cell (360)
description: A short 360° journey through cellular structures with narration.
educational: Pairs with Body VR to reinforce organelles and cell function.

title: Journey Into the Heart (360)
description: A brief 360° exploration of the human heart’s chambers and blood flow.
educational: Good for quick anatomy overviews or lab warm-ups.

title: Operating Room 360 (Surgery Theater)
description: A 360° view inside an operating room with staff and equipment.
educational: Preview content to prepare students for sensitive or graphic material.

title: Grand Canyon National Park 360
description: Sweeping 360° vistas and geological features of the Grand Canyon.
educational: Discuss erosion, time scales, and national park stewardship.

title: Amazon Rainforest 360
description: Immersive rainforest scenes highlighting biodiversity and biome features.
educational: Compare ecosystems and discuss conservation and climate impacts.

title: Himalayas / Everest Base Camp 360
description: A 360° trek through high-altitude terrain and base camp culture.
educational: Connect physical geography to human culture and expedition logistics.

title: Traveling While Black (Meta TV)
description: A powerful immersive documentary exploring the Green Book and travel while Black in America.
educational: Prepare students for mature themes; use for empathy-building and historical context.

title: The Displaced (NYT)
description: Immersive reporting following children displaced by conflict.
educational: Use to discuss migration, media literacy, and humanitarian issues.

title: Clouds Over Sidra (UN/Within)
description: A seminal 360° documentary inside a Syrian refugee camp.
educational: Frame with context and reflective prompts about displacement and resilience.

title: WWI/WWII Battlefield 360 Flyovers
description: Aerial 360° tours of European battlefields and memorials.
educational: Map battles, strategy, and historical geography using immersive visuals.

title: The Louvre 360 Highlights
description: A curated 360° look at iconic artworks and spaces in the Louvre.
educational: Pairs with Open Brush/Gravity Sketch for 3D sketch studies and art analysis.
notes: Use with Open Brush for 3D sketching

title: VirtualSpeech: Presentation Practice (samples)
description: Sample clips and scenarios from the VirtualSpeech platform.
educational: Preview scenarios before booking full VR sessions; discuss delivery and body language.

title: Space Explorers: The ISS Experience (trailers/playlist)
description: High-production series snippets filmed in space aboard the ISS.
educational: Use as a hook for space science units and to compare production vs. educational apps like Mission: ISS.
